errors.error_description: Installation steps are in wrong order - installing package before creating virtual environment
correction_candidates:
First, set up your virtual environment:
```bash
python -m venv pylabrobot-env
source pylabrobot-env/bin/activate  # On Windows: pylabrobot-env\Scripts\activate
```

Then, install PyLabRobot:
```bash
pip install pylabrobot
```

Create and activate a virtual environment, then install:
```bash
python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate
pip install pylabrobot
```

Install using conda environment:
```bash
conda create -n pylabrobot python=3.8
conda activate pylabrobot
pip install pylabrobot
```

Set up development environment:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/pylabrobot/pylabrobot.git
cd pylabrobot
python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate
pip install -e .
```
